title: Procurement for the supply of 11,000,000 bottles of 500ml Sodium Chloride Intravenous Infusion BP 0.9% w/v or Sodium Chloride Injection USP, 0.9% w/v
decision_details: - The proposal made by the Minister of Healthcare and Indigenous Medical Services, to award the procurement for the supply of 11,000,000 bottles of 500ml Sodium Chloride Intravenous Infusion BP 0.9% w/v or Sodium Chloride Injection USP, 0.9% w/v, to M/s  Sitchuan Kelun Pharmaceutical Co. Ltd., China, at a total Cost and Freight price of US$ 2.92 million, as recommended by the Standing Cabinet Appointed Procurement Committee, was approved by the Cabinet.
